meanings.definition: Electrons emitted from a material when it absorbs photons
meanings.sent1: The photoelectrons were released when light hit the metal.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study photoelectrons to understand how light interacts with matter.
meanings.sent3: The photoelectrons partied with the photons after being set free.
meanings.sent4: Like messengers of light, photoelectrons carry the energy of photons.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny photoelectrons dancing out of a material as soon as light touches it.

meanings.definition: Electrons produced by the photoelectric effect
meanings.sent1: We observed the photoelectrons escaping the metal surface.
meanings.sent2: The photoelectrons generated an electric current when they were released.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous photoelectrons played hide and seek with the scientists.
meanings.sent4: In the world of electrons, photoelectrons are like stars shining bright.
meanings.sent5: The photoelectrons leaped out like eager messengers carrying the light's energy.
